content:
RE: DMA (Document Management Alliance) Technical Meeting

Dennis E. Hamilton (hamilton@parc.xerox.com)
Mon, 10 Jun 1996 16:09:55 PDT

  • Messages sorted by: [ date ][ thread ][ subject ][ author ]
  • Previous message: David J. Fiander: "Re: Version identifier in URL" 
Larry,

On Friday, the DMA Technical Committee moved its next meeting away from the 
week of July 8 in order to accelerate some of its work.  (The meeting will 
be in Costa Mesa the week of June 24).

Thanks for trying to set up a way for people to attend both meetings 
without conflicts.

Dennis

----------
From: 	Larry Masinter[SMTP:masinter@parc.xerox.com]
Sent: 	Thursday, June 06, 1996 23:56 PM
To: 	davidf@worf.mks.com
Cc: 	andre@bigtime.cs.colorado.edu; www-vers-wg@ics.uci.edu
Subject: 	Re: More versioning thoughts.

[. . .]

I was hoping also that some things would get discussed at a July 8 f2f
meeting at NaviSoft, but I hadn't heard back about whether the July 10
meeting could get moved. (The DMA technical committee meets in the SF
bay area July 9-12.)

If Navisoft can't host on July 8, I could probably arrange to host the
meeting at Xerox PARC.

Larry

  • Previous message: David J. Fiander: "Re: Version identifier in URL"
